text: Yosef Yitzhak Paritzky (; 14 September 1955 â€“ 5 October 2021) was an Israeli attorney, politician and columnist. He was born in Jerusalem, Israel. He was the Minister of National Infrastructure from 2003 until 2004. He was a member of Knesset between 1999 until 2006. Paritzky died on 5 October 2021 at the age of 66. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Politicians from Jerusalem Category:Lawyers from Jerusalem Category:Israeli journalists Category:Writers from Jerusalem
title: Yosef Paritzky
